message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this great product to you first. I think it would be very valuable to you.  I'm asking for $115. What do you think?
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am looking to stay within my budget. Would it be possible to negotiate the price down to $100?
Hi Bob, I understand your budget constraints, but $100 is just too low for me. Could we meet in the middle somewhere, perhaps at $108?
Hello Alice, thank you for considering my budget. I appreciate the flexibility. Would it be possible to negotiate the price down to $105?
